tagline: Keeps agile teams healthy, predictable, and continuously improving
pros: Turns chaotic teams into predictable delivery machines
Removes impediments before they become blockers
Facilitates retros that actually produce change
Protects team focus from mid-sprint disruptions
cons: Less useful for solo or very small teams
Agile ceremonies add overhead that not every project needs
Can't solve problems that are fundamentally about staffing or strategy

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
